changeSet.author: bellos
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE task_per_ricerca ( id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, tipoatto_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, key_code varchar(45) NOT NULL, descrizione varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, type_code varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY fk_task_1_idx (tipoatto_id), CONSTRAINT fk_task_1 FOREIGN KEY (tipoatto_id) REFERENCES tipoatto (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: bellos
bellos

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO tipologia_ricerca (id,code,descrizione) VALUES (1,'COMM_CONS','Commissioni Consiliari'); INSERT INTO tipologia_ricerca (id,code,descrizione) VALUES (2,'CONS_QUART_REV_CONT','Ricerca Cons Quart Rev Cont');

changeSet.author: bellos
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tipologia_ricerca_task ( id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, tip_ricerca_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, task_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY fk_ricerca_per_task_taskid_idx (task_id), KEY fk_tipologia_ricerca_task_tip_ric_idx (tip_ricerca_id), CONSTRAINT fk_ricerca_per_task_taskid FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES task_per_ricerca (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_tipologia_ricerca_task_tip_ric FOREIGN KEY (tip_ricerca_id) REFERENCES tipologia_ricerca (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=25 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: bellos
